parameters.definition: Hours per shift for a regular fire fighter
Earnings per shift for a regular fire fighter
Hours per shift for an emergency fire fighter
Earnings per shift for an emergency fire fighter
Minimum required fire fighter hours due to wildfires
Available budget for hiring fire fighters

description: A fire department employs regular and emergency fire fighters. A regular fire fighter works \param{HoursRegular} hours per shift and earns \param{EarningsRegular}. An emergency fire fighter works \param{HoursEmergency} hours per shift and earns \param{EarningsEmergency}. Due to wildfires in the region, the fire department needs at least \param{MinHours} hours of fire fighter time. If the fire department has a budget of \param{Budget}, how many of each should the fire department hire to minimize the total number of fire fighters?
